name: Barbell Back Squat
instructions:
1. Position the barbell on your upper back
2. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
3. Descend by pushing hips back and bending knees
4. Lower until thighs are parallel to floor
5. Drive through heels to return to standing

name: Front Squat
instructions:
1. Rest barbell on front deltoids
2. Keep elbows high throughout
3. Descend keeping torso upright
4. Drive through heels to stand

name: Goblet Squat
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbell at chest level
2. Squat between legs
3. Keep chest tall
4. Drive up to standing

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions:
1. Place rear foot on bench
2. Lower until rear knee nearly touches floor
3. Drive through front heel to stand

name: Walking Lunge
instructions:
1. Step forward into lunge
2. Lower rear knee toward floor
3. Push off front foot
4. Step through to next lunge

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions:
1. Step backward into lunge
2. Lower rear knee toward floor
3. Push off rear foot to return

name: Step Up
instructions:
1. Stand facing box or bench
2. Step up with one foot
3. Drive through heel to stand tall
4. Step back down with control

name: Bench Press
instructions:
1. Lie on bench with eyes under bar
2. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder width
3. Unrack and lower bar to mid-chest
4. Press bar back up to starting position

name: Incline Bench Press
instructions:
1. Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
2. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
3. Lower to upper chest
4. Press to lockout

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions:
1. Set bench to decline position
2. Secure feet under pads
3. Lower bar to lower chest
4. Press to lockout

name: Close Grip Bench Press
instructions:
1. Grip bar at shoulder width or narrower
2. Keep elbows close to body
3. Lower to lower chest
4. Press to lockout

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions:
1. Lie on bench with dumbbells
2. Press dumbbells up
3. Lower with control
4. Keep slight arch in back

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions:
1. Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
2. Hold dumbbells at shoulder level
3. Press dumbbells up and together
4. Lower with control

name: Deadlift
instructions:
1. Stand with feet hip-width apart
2. Bend at hips and knees to grip bar
3. Keep back flat and chest up
4. Drive through heels and extend hips
5. Stand tall with bar at thighs

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions:
1. Take wide stance with toes pointed out
2. Grip bar inside legs
3. Keep chest up and back flat
4. Drive through legs to stand

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions:
1. Hold bar at hip height
2. Hinge at hips, pushing them back
3. Lower bar along legs
4. Return to standing by extending hips

name: Stiff Leg Deadlift
instructions:
1. Keep legs nearly straight
2. Hinge at hips to lower bar
3. Feel stretch in hamstrings
4. Return to standing

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
instructions:
1. Stand inside trap bar
2. Grip handles at sides
3. Drive through heels to stand
4. Lower with control

name: Overhead Press
instructions:
1. Start with bar at shoulder height
2. Grip slightly wider than shoulders
3. Press bar overhead until arms lock out
4. Lower bar back to shoulders

name: Push Press
instructions:
1. Start with bar at shoulders
2. Dip slightly at knees
3. Explosively drive bar overhead
4. Lock out at top

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions:
1. Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulders
2. Press dumbbells overhead
3. Lower with control

name: Arnold Press
instructions:
1. Start with dumbbells at chest, palms facing you
2. Rotate and press overhead
3. Reverse motion to lower

name: Barbell Row
instructions:
1. Hinge at hips with slight knee bend
2. Grip bar wider than shoulder width
3. Pull bar to lower chest
4. Lower with control

name: Pendlay Row
instructions:
1. Start with bar on floor
2. Keep back parallel to ground
3. Explosively row to chest
4. Return bar to floor each rep

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions:
1. Place one hand and knee on bench
2. Hold dumbbell in free hand
3. Pull dumbbell to hip
4. Lower with control

name: Chest Supported Row
instructions:
1. Lie face down on incline bench
2. Let arms hang with dumbbells
3. Row dumbbells to sides
4. Lower with control

name: T-Bar Row
instructions:
1. Straddle T-bar with feet
2. Grip handle with both hands
3. Row bar to chest
4. Lower with control

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions:
1. Sit at cable row station
2. Keep chest up and back flat
3. Pull handle to abdomen
4. Squeeze shoulder blades

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions:
1. Sit with thighs under pad
2. Grip bar wider than shoulder width
3. Pull bar to upper chest
4. Squeeze shoulder blades together
5. Return with control

name: Close Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions:
1. Use V-bar or close grip attachment
2. Pull to upper chest
3. Squeeze lats at bottom
4. Return with control

name: Straight Arm Pulldown
instructions:
1. Stand facing cable machine
2. Keep arms straight
3. Pull bar down to thighs
4. Return with control

name: Pull-up
instructions:
1. Hang from bar with overhand grip
2. Pull body up until chin over bar
3. Lower with control

name: Chin-up
instructions:
1. Hang from bar with underhand grip
2. Pull up until chin over bar
3. Lower with control

name: Neutral Grip Pull-up
instructions:
1. Use parallel grip handles
2. Pull up until chin over handles
3. Lower with control

name: Bicep Curl
instructions:
1. Stand with dumbbells at sides
2. Curl weights toward shoulders
3. Keep elbows stationary
4. Lower with control

name: Barbell Curl
instructions:
1. Stand with bar at thighs
2. Curl bar toward shoulders
3. Keep elbows at sides
4. Lower with control

name: Hammer Curl
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbells with neutral grip
2. Curl weights toward shoulders
3. Keep palms facing each other
4. Lower with control

name: Preacher Curl
instructions:
1. Rest upper arms on preacher pad
2. Curl bar toward shoulders
3. Lower with control
4. Keep upper arms stationary

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions:
1. Sit on incline bench
2. Let arms hang straight
3. Curl dumbbells up
4. Lower with full stretch

name: Concentration Curl
instructions:
1. Sit with elbow on inner thigh
2. Curl dumbbell toward shoulder
3. Squeeze at top
4. Lower with control

name: Cable Curl
instructions:
1. Stand facing low cable
2. Curl bar toward shoulders
3. Keep elbows at sides
4. Lower with control

name: Tricep Pushdown
instructions:
1. Attach rope or bar to high cable
2. Keep elbows at sides
3. Push down until arms straight
4. Return with control

name: Tricep Rope Pushdown
instructions:
1. Attach rope to high cable
2. Push down and spread rope at bottom
3. Squeeze triceps
4. Return with control

name: Skull Crusher
instructions:
1. Lie on bench holding bar
2. Lower bar toward forehead
3. Keep upper arms vertical
4. Extend to straighten arms

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbell overhead with both hands
2. Lower behind head by bending elbows
3. Extend to straighten arms

name: Tricep Dip
instructions:
1. Support body on parallel bars
2. Keep torso upright
3. Lower by bending elbows
4. Press back up

name: Bench Dip
instructions:
1. Place hands on bench behind you
2. Extend legs in front
3. Lower body by bending elbows
4. Press back up

name: Lateral Raise
instructions:
1. Stand with dumbbells at sides
2. Raise arms out to sides
3. Lift to shoulder height
4. Lower with control

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions:
1. Stand sideways to low cable
2. Raise arm out to side
3. Lift to shoulder height
4. Lower with control

name: Front Raise
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbells in front of thighs
2. Raise arms to front
3. Lift to shoulder height
4. Lower with control

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions:
1. Bend over at hips
2. Hold dumbbells hanging down
3. Raise arms out to sides
4. Squeeze shoulder blades

name: Face Pull
instructions:
1. Set cable at face height
2. Use rope attachment
3. Pull toward face, elbows high
4. Squeeze shoulder blades

name: Upright Row
instructions:
1. Hold bar at thighs
2. Pull bar up toward chin
3. Lead with elbows
4. Lower with control

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions:
1. Hold bar at thighs
2. Shrug shoulders toward ears
3. Hold at top briefly
4. Lower with control

name: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions:
1. Hold dumbbells at sides
2. Shrug shoulders up
3. Squeeze at top
4. Lower with control

name: Cable Fly
instructions:
1. Set cables at chest height
2. Stand in split stance
3. Bring handles together in front
4. Return with control

name: Low to High Cable Fly
instructions:
1. Set cables at low position
2. Bring handles up and together
3. Focus on upper chest
4. Return with control

name: High to Low Cable Fly
instructions:
1. Set cables at high position
2. Bring handles down and together
3. Focus on lower chest
4. Return with control

name: Dumbbell Fly
instructions:
1. Lie on bench with dumbbells above
2. Lower arms out to sides
3. Keep slight bend in elbows
4. Bring weights back together

name: Pec Deck
instructions:
1. Sit with back against pad
2. Place forearms on pads
3. Bring pads together in front
4. Return with control

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions:
1. Sit with back against pad
2. Grip handles at chest level
3. Press forward until arms extend
4. Return with control

name: Leg Press
instructions:
1. Sit in leg press machine
2. Place feet shoulder-width on platform
3. Lower weight by bending knees
4. Press back to start

name: Hack Squat
instructions:
1. Position shoulders under pads
2. Place feet on platform
3. Lower by bending knees
4. Press back to start

name: Leg Extension
instructions:
1. Sit in machine with back against pad
2. Position pad above ankles
3. Extend legs fully
4. Lower with control

name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions:
1. Lie face down on machine
2. Position pad above heels
3. Curl weight toward glutes
4. Lower with control

name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions:
1. Sit with back against pad
2. Position pad above ankles
3. Curl weight by bending knees
4. Return with control

name: Hip Thrust
instructions:
1. Sit with upper back against bench
2. Roll barbell over hips
3. Drive through heels to lift hips
4. Squeeze glutes at top

name: Glute Bridge
instructions:
1. Lie on back with knees bent
2. Drive through heels to lift hips
3. Squeeze glutes at top
4. Lower with control

name: Cable Pull Through
instructions:
1. Face away from low cable
2. Hinge at hips, reach back for rope
3. Stand by extending hips
4. Squeeze glutes at top

name: Good Morning
instructions:
1. Position bar on upper back
2. Hinge at hips with slight knee bend
3. Lower torso toward parallel
4. Return to standing

name: Hip Adductor Machine
instructions:
1. Sit with legs spread on pads
2. Squeeze legs together
3. Hold briefly at center
4. Return with control

name: Hip Abductor Machine
instructions:
1. Sit with legs on pads
2. Push legs apart
3. Hold briefly at end
4. Return with control

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions:
1. Stand on edge of platform
2. Rise up on balls of feet
3. Squeeze calves at top
4. Lower heels below platform

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions:
1. Sit with knees under pad
2. Rise up on balls of feet
3. Squeeze calves at top
4. Lower with control

name: Donkey Calf Raise
instructions:
1. Bend at hips, back flat
2. Position pad on lower back
3. Rise up on balls of feet
4. Lower with control

name: Plank
instructions:
1. Support body on forearms and toes
2. Keep body in straight line
3. Engage core throughout
4. Hold for prescribed time

name: Side Plank
instructions:
1. Support body on one forearm and feet
2. Stack feet or stagger them
3. Keep hips elevated
4. Hold for prescribed time

name: Dead Bug
instructions:
1. Lie on back with arms up
2. Lift legs with knees bent 90Â°
3. Lower opposite arm and leg
4. Return and alternate

name: Crunch
instructions:
1. Lie on back with knees bent
2. Place hands behind head
3. Curl shoulders off floor
4. Lower with control

name: Cable Crunch
instructions:
1. Kneel facing cable with rope
2. Hold rope behind head
3. Crunch down toward floor
4. Return with control

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions:
1. Hang from bar
2. Raise legs to parallel
3. Keep legs straight
4. Lower with control

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions:
1. Hang from bar
2. Raise knees toward chest
3. Curl pelvis up
4. Lower with control

name: Russian Twist
instructions:
1. Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly
2. Hold weight at chest
3. Rotate torso side to side
4. Keep core engaged

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions:
1. Kneel with hands on wheel
2. Roll out extending body
3. Go as far as can control
4. Roll back to start

name: Pallof Press
instructions:
1. Stand sideways to cable
2. Hold handle at chest
3. Press handle straight out
4. Resist rotation

name: Push-up
instructions:
1. Start in plank position
2. Lower chest to floor
3. Push back up to start
4. Keep body in straight line

name: Diamond Push-up
instructions:
1. Place hands together under chest
2. Form diamond shape with fingers
3. Lower chest to hands
4. Push back up

name: Pike Push-up
instructions:
1. Start in pike position, hips high
2. Lower head toward floor
3. Push back up
4. Keep legs straight

name: Chest Dip
instructions:
1. Support body on parallel bars
2. Lower by bending elbows
3. Lean forward slightly for chest
4. Push back up to start

name: Inverted Row
instructions:
1. Lie under bar at waist height
2. Grip bar with overhand grip
3. Pull chest to bar
4. Lower with control

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions:
1. Kneel with ankles secured
2. Lower body forward slowly
3. Control descent with hamstrings
4. Push back up or use hands

name: Sissy Squat
instructions:
1. Stand on balls of feet
2. Lean back while bending knees
3. Lower hips toward heels
4. Return to standing

name: Muscle Up
instructions:
1. Hang from bar
2. Pull explosively
3. Transition over bar
4. Push to lockout

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions:
1. Upper back on bench
2. Bar over hips
3. Drive hips up
4. Squeeze glutes at top

name: Farmer's Carry
instructions:
1. Hold heavy weights at sides
2. Walk with tall posture
3. Keep core braced
4. Walk for distance or time

name: Wrist Curl
instructions:
1. Sit with forearms on thighs
2. Let wrists hang over knees
3. Curl bar up with wrists
4. Lower with control

name: Reverse Wrist Curl
instructions:
1. Sit with forearms on thighs, palms down
2. Let wrists hang over knees
3. Raise bar with wrist extension
4. Lower with control

name: Rowing Machine
instructions:
1. Sit on rower with feet strapped in
2. Push with legs first
3. Pull handle to chest
4. Return in reverse order

name: Treadmill Run
instructions:
1. Set desired speed and incline
2. Maintain steady pace
3. Pump arms naturally
4. Land midfoot

name: Stationary Bike
instructions:
1. Adjust seat height
2. Maintain steady cadence
3. Keep core engaged
4. Vary resistance as needed

name: Elliptical
instructions:
1. Step onto pedals
2. Hold handles or let arms move
3. Push and pull with legs
4. Maintain steady rhythm

name: Stair Climber
instructions:
1. Step onto stairs
2. Hold handrails lightly
3. Step in steady rhythm
4. Keep upright posture

name: Battle Ropes
instructions:
1. Hold rope ends at waist
2. Alternate arm waves
3. Keep core engaged
4. Continue for duration

name: Box Jump
instructions:
1. Stand facing box
2. Swing arms and jump
3. Land softly on box
4. Step down carefully

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions:
1. Hinge at hips, grip kettlebell
2. Swing between legs
3. Drive hips forward explosively
4. Swing to chest height

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
instructions:
1. Hold kettlebell at chest
2. Squat between legs
3. Keep chest tall
4. Drive up to standing

name: Turkish Get Up
instructions:
1. Lie down holding kettlebell up
2. Roll to elbow, then hand
3. Sweep leg through to kneeling
4. Stand up, reverse to return

name: Barbell Snatch
instructions:
1. Wide grip on bar at floor
2. Pull explosively from floor
3. Catch bar overhead in squat
4. Stand to complete lift

name: Clean and Jerk
instructions:
1. Pull bar from floor to shoulders
2. Catch in front squat
3. Dip and drive bar overhead
4. Catch in split stance

name: Power Clean
instructions:
1. Start with bar at floor
2. Pull explosively
3. Catch at shoulders without squatting
4. Return bar to floor

name: Thruster
instructions:
1. Hold bar at shoulders
2. Squat down
3. Stand and press overhead
4. Lower and repeat

name: Burpee
instructions:
1. Stand, then squat down
2. Jump feet back to plank
3. Optional push-up
4. Jump feet forward and jump up

name: Mountain Climber
instructions:
1. Start in plank position
2. Drive one knee toward chest
3. Alternate legs quickly
4. Keep core tight

name: Jumping Jack
instructions:
1. Stand with feet together
2. Jump feet apart while raising arms
3. Jump back to start
4. Repeat in rhythm

name: Jump Rope
instructions:
1. Hold rope handles at sides
2. Swing rope overhead
3. Jump as rope passes
4. Land softly on balls of feet

name: Sled Push
instructions:
1. Load sled with weight
2. Push from high or low handles
3. Drive through legs
4. Push for distance or time

name: Sled Pull
instructions:
1. Attach rope to sled
2. Pull hand over hand
3. Keep back engaged
4. Pull for distance or time
